title: An elevator in a dream is good news

preview.html: If he enters the narrow elevator in the dream, this indicates the tension in which he lives and that he is suffering from pressures in his life. Interpretation of seeing an elevator in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is entering the elevator in a dream and she is afraid. It is an indication that she will enter into many crises in the future. Her life during this period of time. And if she gets off the elevator she feels very happy and gets rid of it in the dream. It explains that she will get rid of something that made her very angry in her life, and God knows best. If the elevator is narrow in the dream and the unmarried woman is trying to widen it in the dream. This is a sign that she feels... It indicates great sadness and bad things in her life and lives in it. Likewise, an unmarried girl who dreams that she looks at the elevator and rejoices because it is spacious. It indicates the happy life that this single girl will see in her affairs and life. See also: Interpretation of dreams about opening the door for single peopleInterpretation of seeing the elevator in A dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream, then she goes up in the elevator in the dream, and it is very narrow. It indicates that she will enter into financial and material crises in this period of her life, and God knows best. If a married woman in a dream looks at the elevator, then it was very wide in The dream. This is a sign that she will see the good in her life, and the happy life that she will live. A married woman dreams that the elevator is very large and she goes inside. It indicates that she will experience new happy things in her life, God willing. A married woman seeing in a dream that she is looking at the elevator in The dream and she did not enter. It shows that she is looking into major problems in her life and she will be able to get rid of them quickly. Interpretation of seeing an elevator in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that she is looking at an elevator in a dream and entering it. It indicates that she will start a new life now with a new person, and God knows best. And seeing That the divorced woman was entering the elevator in the dream, and it was very narrow in the dream. It shows that she will face major crises in her life and will not be able to get rid of them easily. If a divorced woman dreamed that the elevator was very large and she entered it. It indicates that during this period she will enter into a new experience. And he lives it with great happiness. What if the elevator broke in a dream and the divorced woman who was dreaming was in it? It explains that she will face many bad and difficult things in her life, and she will not get rid of them easily. Interpretation of seeing an elevator in a dream for a man and its meaningIf the dreamer sees in a dream that he enters the elevator in the dream and is happy With it. Fidel indicates that he will seize the opportunity of a new experience in his professional life and succeed. If the dreamer looks at the elevator in a dream and does not enter it in the dream. It indicates that he will face many things in his life that will bother him and he will try to fix them. Also, if the dreamer sees in a dream that the elevator is very large in the dream And spacious on the inside. Here is a clear interpretation that this dreamer will get rid of the big problems he saw. If a man looks at the broken elevator while he is outside and tries to fix it in a dream. This is an indication that he is trying to fix some wrong things in his life that are hindering his affairs. Read also: The key to the dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream - seeing death in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death in a dream - seeing death in a dream Interpretation of a dream about death Interpretation of seeing death in a dream. You can see: Interpretation of a dream about seeing eggs In such situations, the saying that death destroys pleasures and divides groups was true. It is also the final touch in a personâ€™s life. All of this death has its horror. Even if it comes as a dream within a dream, or as a passing dream, or even if it is a dream, seeing a dead person in a dream has many connotations, such as: goodness when he was afraid or sad. returning deposits. saving the patient from his illness. releasing the prisoner. From his prison. Meeting of the absent. Lack of debts and corruption. Rise in the world (if the dream is accompanied by screaming and crying and the dead person is not buried in the ground). Wrong position (if the dream is accompanied by screaming and crying and the dead person is buried in the ground). Sudden death shows the speed of wealth for the poor. Death The prophets, peace be upon them, are evidence of the weakness of religion. The death of a scholar indicates the emergence of heresies in religion. The death of parents indicates the difficulty of life. The death of a wife indicates the absence of a scholar. The death of a boy indicates the disappearance of the male. The death of brothers indicates the death of enemies. Dead polytheists indicate enemies. Obtaining On sustenance from the dead. Talking to the dead is a long life. Interpretation of a dream about death: Seeing a dead person in a dream is interpreted according to his appearance, condition, and what he does during the dream. On the authority of the translator Abu Saeed, may God have mercy on him: Death in a dream regrets a great matter, so whoever sees that he died and then lives, He commits a sin and then repents according to the words of God Almighty: They said: Our Lord! Whoever dies without illness or his body is dying, his life will be prolonged. It also includes: The basic principle in a dream about a dead person - and God knows best - is that if you see a dead person in your dream, then he is doing something good, so he urges you to do it if you see him. Doing a bad deed, he prevents you and tells you not to do it. Among the interpretations of seeing dead people in a dream are the following: Whoever sees a dead person telling him that he is not dead, then he is in the place of witnesses. Whoever sees a sick dead person, he is responsible for his religion. And whoever sees a dead person in a good condition and he is laughing, then his condition is like his Lord. Whoever sees that he is accompanying a dead person; He travels far. He who sees the dead strikes the living. The living has corrupted his religion. Anyone who sees a dead person is beaten. Getting better from the trip. Who saw a dead person sleeping. His sleep will rest in the afterlife. Whoever dreams that a dead person is talking to him, then everything that the dead person said about himself or others is true and true. Whoever sees that the dead person is alive in his dream. God will raise for him what he died. Whoever sees that the dead personâ€™s face is black. He died in disbelief. Interpretation of greeting a dead person in a dream: Whoever sees that a dead person tells him that he has not died is in the place of witnesses. Whoever sees a sick dead person is responsible for his religion. Whoever sees a dead person in good condition and laughing, then his condition is like his Lord. Whoever sees that he is accompanying a dead person; He travels far. He who sees the dead strikes the living. The living has corrupted his religion. Anyone who sees a dead person is beaten. Getting better from the trip. Who saw a dead person sleeping. His sleep will rest in the afterlife. Whoever dreams that a dead person is talking to him, then everything that the dead person said about himself or others is true and true. Whoever sees that the dead person is alive in his dream. God will raise for him what he died. Whoever sees that the dead personâ€™s face is black. He died in disbelief.Interpretation of kissing the dead in a dreamKissing the dead is interpreted

title: Dream interpretation of seeing someone who looks like me in a dream, for better or for worse

preview.html: In this article, we discuss the interpretation of a dream when I see someone who looks like me via the encyclopedia website. In addition, dear reader, we learn the interpretation of seeing a person in two copies in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a person similar to someone I know in a dream and we also discuss the interpretations of seeing a person more beautiful than the truth. Add to that the evidence of seeing the face of someone I know change. Interpretation of a dream when I see someone who looks like me. The world of dreams and visions is a vast world, and it is never easy to overcome, and you, dear reader, must choose the person who interprets your dream carefully, so he must know, because the vision is one of the blessings. . God - the Almighty - whether it is a promising vision or a warning vision, both of them indicate the care of God - Glory be to Him - the Most High - for His servants, so either tell your vision to a lover or a fortune teller. A person, and it is not advisable to tell anyone about your vision because the vision is jealous like any blessing for a person, so just find someone who loves you and tell him your dream or tell him an intelligent translator to interpret your vision for you and understand God Almightyâ€™s message to you through this vision. We present to you, dear reader, the interpretation of seeing someone who looks like me in a dream through the leading scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions: Seeing someone who looks like me indicates kindness in general, as the scholar Ibn Sirin believes that if you dream of someone who looks like you and is optimistic, this is evidence that the dreamer has a good reputation. And good manners. Seeing someone who looks like you with a disapproving face is not a praiseworthy vision because it is a clear indication that the person who sees has committed a sin or disobedience, but the good thing about it is that he will feel remorse for committing this. Action. Seeing someone giving you a gift and his appearance was similar to a fortune teller, means that the person will receive a promotion or occupy an important position that will raise his status in society. Interpretation of seeing a stranger observing the dreamer, and at the same time similar to him in features, this is evidence that this person He fears God - the Almighty - in his words and actions, and stays away from sins and forbidden things. Interpretation of seeing a duplicate person in a dream: Explaining the connotations of seeing a person in a dream in two images or in two copies and his relationship with the fortuneteller through the following lines: The interpretation of any vision varies according to the marital status of the fortuneteller if a married woman sees her husband in two copies. Or twice and he was sitting near her, and the two versions were confused in the dream. This vision expresses the reality of the married woman, which is that she is already suffering from hesitation and confusion about her husband and has not yet decided whether to ask for a divorce from him or continue her life with him. A vision that is strange to insight, It was of two versions, indicating a situation in which the person with the vision is experiencing lack of stability and distraction in his real life and has not yet achieved his goals. As for the single girl, this vision indicates that there are more than one person who wants to propose to her and get close to her, and she will be confused about her matter, due to the proximity of these people in her life. Many characteristics. We advise the unmarried girl in this case to perform the Istikhara prayer so that God - the Almighty - chooses someone who is suitable for her, so she prays to God often that she marries the most suitable person for her. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that there is another girl who

title: The 9 most famous interpretations of seeing plants in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a harvest of green crops? This means that he gets more money. What is the meaning of seeing a person seeing a yellow plant in a dream? It means illness. What is the interpretation of seeing green crops for a pregnant woman? It means good health. The meaning of seeing green crops for a married woman? This It means that he will be fine. What is the interpretation of seeing farming outside the season? This means that there are many problems that you will face during this period. Interpretation of seeing crops in a manâ€™s dreamIf a single man is found watering the crops, this is a sign of soon marrying a religious girl. It means a man A married man with a plant means that his wife will be pregnant provided that the plant is green and mature. If one sees in a dream that the plant is yellow, or green, and its color is yellow, this means illness. If he is sick and finds a yellow seed in a dream, this means that the term is near, and God Almighty knows best. Walking among the crops means that this man will go out as a warrior to defend his homeland. If he dreams that he is planting barley, this means little money. He dreamed of picking green crops, and this was in his time, it means that he gets more money. It could indicate Planting the harvest also indicates movement and travel for work and making a lot of profits. Seeing a dream about planting for a married woman. Green planting for a married woman means that she will do well. Sowing means earning a livelihood for having a new child, especially if it is harvest season for planting. If planting is out of season, it means that There are many problems that he will face during this period. If he finds himself learning in green agricultural land, this means that he will have a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about agriculture for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about green plants for a single woman means the psychological and moral stability that she will enjoy during this period and green agriculture. It indicates the happiness that you are experiencing. While yellow crops indicate exhaustion, and it may mean the death of a relative, and in fact she was suffering from some disease, or that some disease fell upon her. If you find that green crops wither quickly and die, this means the great difficulties that you will find. In the best interpretation of a single womanâ€™s dream, if she finds herself doing farm work and this farm is green, it is a sign of an urgent marriage to a good and righteous man, while if he reaps the seed and it is actually harvested, it means that he will marry someone he knows or someone he loves, and that his future life will be happy. Interpretation of a dream about an implant in a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing an implant for a pregnant woman means good health if these implants are mature and beautiful, as well as a happy life after the birth of her child, since she is still at the beginning of her pregnancy and does not see any implantation, this means some health problems that she faces until the time of birth, but they She will give birth safely and in good health, by God Almightyâ€™s will.

title: Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretations of seeing the neck in a dream for a pregnant woman

preview.html: The earring is considered one of the important things for a woman, which gives her an appearance of beauty and distinction, and seeing it in a dream has many connotations, which are often beneficial to the dreamer, but the interpretation may differ according to the type of material the earring is made of, in addition to the social status of the fortuneteller. The neck in a dream for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant womanâ€™s neck in a dream? Most interpretive scholars say that the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant womanâ€™s neck is a sign of knowing the sex of the fetus, and the dream could be a sign that this woman looks attractive despite the fatigue and pain she is going through at this stage. The type of material from which it is made The earring indicates the gender of the fetus. The gold earring indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and the silver earring indicates that she will give birth to a girl. If a pregnant woman sees that she has lost one earring and that the earring is silver, this indicates her illness and weakness. To know Ibn Sirinâ€™s interpretations of other dreams, go to Google and type site. Egyptian dream interpretation... You will find everything you are looking for. What is the interpretation of seeing the neck in a dream of Ibn Sirinâ€™s pregnant wife? Ibn Sirin says that dreaming of a pregnant womanâ€™s neck is one of the dreams that bodes well, and it symbolizes that this woman will make many changes in her life , as it can indicate abundance of money or abundance of sustenance. The way is for her. If the earring is lost or misplaced, this indicates many skirmishes and problems between her and her husband. If she is sick, the vision shows her complete recovery from all the diseases that she was suffering from. The most important interpretations of the neck in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing a golden earring in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing an earring Golden in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her newborn will be healthy and well, and seeing it can be a sign of the abundance of kindness and nourishment that comes to her and evidence that she listens a lot. Of the good news in the near future.Interpretation of a dream of a golden earring in a dream for a pregnant woman.Interpretation of a dream of a golden earring in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream means that she will overcome all her problems and fears and overcome them by Godâ€™s will, and the dream may indicate the approaching date of her due date.Interpretation of losing one gold ring in a dream for a woman Pregnant: A dream about losing a gold earring in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream is a sign for her that the health of her newborn will be weak and weak. This vision also shows that the woman will suffer from many problems between her and her husband. Perhaps this dream indicates that she is fascinated by worldly matters and that she is far from matters of religion, or it means that she She does not reach her relatives, and the jurists interpreted this vision as one of the unpleasant visions that indicates the loss of a woman close to her. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a necklace in a dream for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees herself wearing an earring in a dream, this means that she enjoys psychological comfort and indicates an improvement in her health, It also indicates that she will hear happy and joyful news in the coming days and in the case of the earring she is wearing tight, her vision symbolizes that she is making many wrong decisions. title: Interpretation of seeing charity in a dream and its meanings for good and evil

preview.html: In this article, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing charity in a dream in different situations. Alms is money given and distributed to the poor to help them. It is one of the best types of goodness that a person can do, as it relieves sadness and removes worries and problems, but what about the interpretation of seeing charity in a dream, which many people see in their dreams and are looking for an interpretation of this dream that brings them many good things. Dream. Interpretation of seeing charity in a dream: Charity is one of the things that God has commanded us to do, because of its impact on social solidarity between the rich and the poor in the same society. Some dreams are among the things that come true immediately, thanks to God Almighty, addressing our master Abraham through them and sending orders for worship. What it symbolizes in our dream of seeing charity is what we review in our article. Interpretation of seeing charity in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing charity in a dream is one of the good visions that It conveys to the dreamer many good verses. But if a person sees in a dream that he is giving alms with permissible money and good things, this means that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money and blessings will come in his life and he will avoid committing sins. But if he sees in the dream that he is giving alms for forbidden or forbidden things, This means that his money is not permissible, and that he is committing many sins. As for secret charity, it means forgiveness of sins, salvation from them, abundance of knowledge, and abundance of money. But if a person works in trade, then this vision shows a large increase in profit and an increase in money, but if he sees that he is feeding a poor person This indicates freedom from fear and worries. If a person sees in a dream that he is giving food for charity, then this dream means the fear and anxiety that lies in his heart, which will be replaced by peace and tranquility, thanks to God. Whoever sees in his dream that someone is giving him charity, this is evidence On that personâ€™s appreciation of the circumstances of the vision and his feelings towards it, and if this person is the dreamerâ€™s father, this means that the dreamer will benefit from him. One of the ominous dreams is the dream of zakat in coins, as it is a sign of the dreamerâ€™s bankruptcy due to his extravagance. Giving delicious alms and ripe meat in a dream means that the dreamer will receive a lot of money. But if this meat is spoiled and smells foul, then the dream warns its owner against giving up. Sins and sins that he commits in reality. Interpretation of seeing charity in a dream according to Imam Al-Nabulsi. Researcher Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi says: Charity and good deeds indicate the benefit of a person in his life, but if an adulteress sees an adulteress or someone who has committed many sins, this indicates that he will return to sins again. However, if a person dreams that he is giving alms to a thief, then this dream indicates that he will stop stealing and try to keep him away from it. But if the one giving alms to him is an adulterer, then the vision in him indicates the repentance of this woman. But if a person sees in a dream that he is giving alms in secret, then this It indicates forgiveness of sins, repentance, and return to God Almighty. This vision may indicate the closeness of the dreamer to the ruler or king. But if he sees that

title: Interpretation of seeing magical and mundane acts in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing magic in a dream as a warning that something bad will happen to the dreamer. And whoever sees in his dream that he found magic and decoded it, this indicates the end of the problems facing the dreamer, the overcoming of his problems, and that God helps him against those who conspire against him. What is the interpretation of a dream about magic? Seeing a place of magic in a dream indicates the personâ€™s lack of belief in the dream and his shortcomings in worship, or it may indicate a place where sins and disobedience abound or lack of purity. Whoever sees in his dream that he breaks the magic with other magic, this is evidence of forgiveness. In sins and immorality. And whoever sees in his dream that he finds magic buried in his house, this is evidence of a major rebellion affecting family members. And whoever sees in a dream a person bewitched, this is evidence of his mistreatment of his family and the spread of corruption and rebellion among the people. Also, magic in a dream can It also indicates a husband separating from his wife or committing a great sin. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees magic in her dream, this indicates a lack of wisdom in her mind, and she may be attracted to trivial matters and stay away from religion. Meanness in her life and a warning to her to stay away from him. Interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a married woman: Seeing magic in a married womanâ€™s dream indicates mismanagement of her marital and family life affairs in general, and seeing a magician in a married womanâ€™s dream is evidence that a deceiver is approaching her and that he is planning evil schemes against her. Interpretation of seeing magic in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream: Seeing a magician in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream indicates the presence of a hypocrite in her life and she must beware of him, and magic in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream may symbolize her fear of childbirth. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we take your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation. as soon as possible.
